document_data.name: ''Zalantar Club''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Zalantar clubs''''' were simple [[enchanted]] bludgeons crafted using the wood of the [[zalantar]] [[tree]].
document_data.Description: The clubs made of zalantar were hard and light weapons, dark brown or almost black in color.
document_data.Powers: Zalantar wood seemed to have magic flowing through it, which made enchanting items carved out of it an easy and commonly done process. ''Zalantar clubs'' possessed an innate ''+1'' enchantment.
document_data.History: Due to the versatility of zalantar wood, these bludgeons could be found throughout [[Faer√ªn]]. As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], lightly enchanted ''zalantar clubs'' were used in [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Sword Coast North]], and could be found on the markets of [[Westgate]] in the [[Dragon Coast]].
